languages.text: "Мандрагоры... выродки, обретающиеся в недрах Комморры. Их способность находить пути через тени нашло достойное применение. Я обещал им снисхождение и союз, когда стану архонтом Опустошительной бури..." {n}Маражай запинается и движением руки показывает, что закончил говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мандрагоры... проклятые родичи, обретающиеся в самых недрах Комморры. Их искусство находить пути через тени стало неотъемлемой частью моего плана. Я обещал им снисхождение и союз, когда стану архонтом Опустошительной Бури..." {n}Маражай запинается и движением руки показывает, что закончил говорить.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мандрагоры... выродки, обретающиеся в недрах Комморры. Их способность находить пути через тени нашло достойное применение. Я обещал им снисхождение и союз, когда стану архонтом Опустошительной бури..." {n}Маражай запинается и движением руки показывает, что закончил говорить.{/n}

I promised them clemency and an alliance once I am Archon of the Reaving Tempest..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Mandrágoras... una especie inmunda que acecha en las entrañas de Commorragh. Di buen uso a su habilidad de encontrar caminos en las sombras. Les prometí tesoros prohibidos de las arcas de la Tempestad Asoladora cuando sea Arconte...». {n}Marazhai titubea y luego indica con un gesto que considera zanjado el tema.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mandrágoras... una especie inmunda que acecha en las entrañas de Commorragh. Di buen uso a su habilidad de encontrar caminos en las sombras. Les prometí tesoros prohibidos de las arcas de la Tempestad Asoladora cuando sea Arconte...». {n}Marazhai titubea y luego indica con un gesto que considera zanjado el tema.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “是曼德拉……那群邪恶的东西潜伏在科摩罗的肚肠里。他们可以在阴影中穿梭，非常实用。我答应过他们，只要我当上了执政官，就从狂风阴谋团的宝物库里拿出那些禁忌的战利品，分给他们……”{n}玛拉斋犹豫片刻，随后做了个手势，表示他的话已经说完了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是曼德拉……那群邪恶的东西潜伏在科摩罗的肚肠里。他们可以在阴影中穿梭，非常实用。我答应过他们，只要我当上了执政官，就从狂风阴谋团的宝物库里拿出那些禁忌的战利品，分给他们……”{n}玛拉斋犹豫片刻，随后做了个手势，表示他的话已经说完了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「マンドレイク…コモラフの腸に潜む忌まわしき種族さ。影を通して道を見つける彼らの能力は上手く利用された。俺がアーコンになったら略奪の嵐の金庫から禁断のトロフィーを手に入れると約束したんだ…」{n}マラズハイはためらい、それから手ぶりで話の終わりを告げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「マンドレイク…コモラフの腸に潜む忌まわしき種族さ。影を通して道を見つける彼らの能力は上手く利用された。俺がアーコンになったら略奪の嵐の金庫から禁断のトロフィーを手に入れると約束したんだ…」{n}マラズハイはためらい、それから手ぶりで話の終わりを告げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Des Mandragores... une engeance impie qui rôde dans les entrailles de Commorragh. Leur capacité à s'orienter dans les ténèbres m'a bien servi. En échange, je leur ai promis des trophées interdits tout droit sortis des coffres de la Tempête ravageuse une fois que je serai archonte... » {n}Marazhai hésite un instant avant d'indiquer d'un geste qu'il n'a rien d'autre à ajouter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Des Mandragores... une engeance impie qui rôde dans les entrailles de Commorragh. Leur capacité à s'orienter dans les ténèbres m'a bien servi. En échange, je leur ai promis des trophées interdits tout droit sortis des coffres de la Tempête ravageuse une fois que je serai archonte... » {n}Marazhai hésite un instant avant d'indiquer d'un geste qu'il n'a rien d'autre à ajouter.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mandraks ... eine widerwärtige Spezies, die am untersten Ende von Commorragh lauert. Ihre Fähigkeit, Wege durch die Schatten zu finden, wurde sinnvoll eingesetzt. Ich habe ihnen verbotene Trophäen aus den Schatztruhen des plündernden Sturms versprochen, sobald ich Archon bin ..." {n}Marazhai zögert und zeigt dann durch eine Geste an, dass er ausgesprochen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mandraks ... eine widerwärtige Spezies, die am untersten Ende von Commorragh lauert. Ihre Fähigkeit, Wege durch die Schatten zu finden, wurde sinnvoll eingesetzt. Ich habe ihnen verbotene Trophäen aus den Schatztruhen des plündernden Sturms versprochen, sobald ich Archon bin ..." {n}Marazhai zögert und zeigt dann durch eine Geste an, dass er ausgesprochen hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

languages.text: "Kankurutanlar... Commorragh'ın derinlerinde yaşayan, sefil mahluklardır. Gölgeler içinde yön bulma kabiliyetleri iş görüyor. Arkon olunca Müfteris Kasırga mahzenlerindeki yasaklı yadigârlardan verme sözü yetti..." {n}Marazhai bir an için duraksıyor, ardından sözünü bitirdiğini ifade eden bir hareket yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes... a foul breed that lurks in the bowels of Commorragh. Their ability to find paths through the shadows was put to good use. I promised them forbidden trophies from the Reaving Tempest's coffers once I am Archon..." {n}Marazhai hesitates and then gestures to indicate that he is finished speaking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kankurutanlar... Commorragh'ın derinlerinde yaşayan, sefil mahluklar. Gölgeler içinde yön bulma kabiliyetleri iş görüyor. Arkon olunca Müfteris Kasırga mahzenlerinin yasaklı yadigârlarından verme sözü yetti..." {n}Marazhai bir an için duraksıyor, ardından sözünü bitirdiğini söyler gibi bir hareket yapıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
